A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film has excellent visuals and provides the Star Wars sensation that die-hard fans have been craving. The film also provides a very unexpected turn of events. This would have been spectacular if the movie didn't provide a genuine slap in the face to the most legendary Star Wars character of all time. The largest disappointment is the fact that there is no legitimate villain\, making the story difficult to get excited about moving forward. There is nothing scary\, mysterious or intimidating about Kylo Ren.
